ygData.subject: Riposte (more Questions)
ygData.msgSnippet: Jason, This is consistent with a description I have heard before. I guess by your description (if its based on the principles of fencing in the RW) that it
ygData.messageBody:
Jason,

This is consistent with a description I have heard before. I guess by your description (if its based on the principles of fencing in the RW) that it might drive off of successful parries.

Which brings up another question, when you parry do you lose an attack (after all it is your sword that is doing the parrying)? If riposte would be a return off a parry how would this fit into the overall attacks per turn for a high lvl warrior?

One more question, is the riposte damage that people have seen greater than that of their normal weapon? If so this might add all sorts of other cool dynamics to this skill.

If anyone has info to add I'd love to learn more about folks direct experiences with this.

Robert

> >

> >
> > Reposte is a counter attack you get upon a successful parry, based upon
> > skill. I've got it, but I'm not sure if the reposte attack is my damage,
> > or
> > if it actually turns the mobs damage against him....ie, Zealot hits me for
> > 74, I reposte, do I do 74 points of damage, or the damage that my weapon
> > can
> > do?
> >
> > Salr D'Taynkk
> > Dark Warrior of The Kith
> > Veeshan
